name: Mrs Fatima Hassan
subject: Mathematics
qualification: M.Sc. in Applied Mathematics, University of Cape Town
experience: 12 years of teaching mathematics for high and SAT/ACT prep
philosophy: “Breaking down complex problems into simple steps helps every student success.”

name: Mr David Carter
subject: English literature and language
qualification: M.A. in English Literature, University of Cambridge
experience: 10 years of experience teaching English for competitive exams and advanced placement courses
philosophy: “Words have the power to change the world; let’s start with yours.”

name: Ms. Kavita Sharma
subject: Psychology
experience: 5 years of experience teaching and conducting workshops on mental health awareness
philosophy: “A healthy mind is the foundation for academic success.”

name: Mrs. Aisha Ndlovu
subject: History
qualification: M.A. in World History, University of Pretoria
experience: 10 years of teaching history at high school and college levels
philosophy: “History is not just about the past; it’s a guide to the future.”

name: Ms. Elena Garcia
subject: Spanish Language
qualification: M.A. in Spanish Linguistics, University of Madrid
experience: 6 years of experience teaching Spanish to beginners and advanced learners
philosophy: “Learning a new language is opening the door to a new world.”
